part-4_key2: Now, everytime after asking the question, you need to take input from the user ,so that he can guess about what will be the correct answer.
part-4_key3:
User can answer either 1, 2, 3 or 4.
Now, you have taken answer as an input from the user, now you need to check if the user has given correct answer or not.
part-4_key4: If the answer is correct then print "Congrats! Aapka answer sahi hai" otherwiseSadly aapka javab ga1lat hai.
